item.title: 惠誉下调罗马尼亚信用展望并警告预算修正延期
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）表示可能会下调罗马尼亚的信用等级，理由是政治上的高度不确定性可能会推迟在明年重新举行总统选举之前削减欧盟最高预算赤字的计划。【原文：Fitch Ratings signaled it may cut Romania’s credit grade, citing high political uncertainty that’s likely to delay plans to reduce the European Union’s highest budget deficit ahead of a presidential election re-run next year.】

item.title: 英国风力发电量再创新高，天气警告依然有效
item.description: 周二，英国风力发电量创下新纪录，因为强劲的阵风促使英国部分地区发布了天气预警。【原文：UK wind power output reached a fresh record on Tuesday as strong gusts prompted weather warnings across parts of the country.】

item.title: 瑞典房东 SBB 将在掉期交易中发行 28 亿欧元债券
item.description: 瑞典 SBB 银行将出售 28 亿欧元（29.4 亿美元）的新票据，此前债券持有人同意兑换这家资金紧张的房东的现有证券。【原文：Sweden’s SBB will sell €2.8 billion ($2.94 billion) of new notes after bondholders agreed to exchange their existing securities in the cash-strapped landlord.】

item.title: 印尼维持关键利率以抑制卢比汇率下跌
item.description: 印尼央行连续第三个月维持关键利率不变，以支撑印尼盾跌破1美元兑16000印尼盾的关键支撑位。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for a third straight month to support the rupiah that fell past the key support level of 16,000 to the dollar.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克找到乌克兰天然气过境解决方案，欧洲天然气退缩
item.description: 欧洲天然气走低，原因是斯洛伐克推动燃料继续通过乌克兰供应，这使人们对该地区明年的天然气供应更加乐观。【原文：European natural gas edged lower as Slovakia’s push to keep the fuel coming through Ukraine adds optimism about the region’s supply next year.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行增持德国商业银行股份，Orcel 继续追击
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）将其在德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的持股比例增至约 28%，首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）加大了对这家德国贷款机构的收购力度。【原文：UniCredit SpA increased its holding in Commerzbank AG to about 28%, ratcheting up Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel’s pursuit of the German lender.】

item.title: 欧盟与南美的贸易协定为何终于有望达成？
item.description: 欧盟和南美国家花了超过四分之一个世纪的时间试图就自由贸易达成协议。今年，随着全球最大贸易伙伴美国和中国之间迫在眉睫的贸易战，谈判变得更加紧迫，这也促使其他地区寻求新的商业伙伴关系，以缓解贸易战带来的冲击。【原文：The European Union and South American nations have spent more than a quarter of a century trying to strike a deal on free trade. The negotiations took on new urgency this year as a looming trade war between the world’s biggest trading partners — the US and China — spurred other regions to seek out new commercial partnerships to soften the blow.】

item.title: 英国央行决议前英国通胀跃升至八个月高点
item.description: 英国通胀率在 11 月份升至八个月来的新高，进一步高于英国央行 2% 的目标，支持了英国央行将在今年最后一次会议上维持利率不变的预期。【原文：UK inflation rose to an eight-month high in November, drifting further above the Bank of England’s 2% target and supporting expectations that it will hold interest rates at its final meeting of the year.】

item.title: 泰国维持关键利率不变，警告不确定性增加
item.description: 泰国央行在 10 月份意外降息后维持关键利率不变，并警告说未来的不确定性将会增加，因为央行正在抵制政府要求进一步放宽政策的呼吁。【原文：Thailand’s central bank left its key interest rate unchanged after a surprise cut in October, warning of rising future uncertainties as it resists government calls for further policy easing.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 11 月通胀率升至 2.6
韩国央行行长李明博预计戒严令动荡将损害经济增长
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）周三表示，韩国持续的政治动荡对经济造成了压力，暗示当局可能会下调经济增长预测，并采取稳定经济的应对措施。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said Wednesday that the ongoing political turmoil in South Korea weighs on the economy, suggesting authorities may downgrade growth forecasts and take stabilizing actions in response.】

item.title: 土耳其开始在索马里建造火箭发射设施
item.description: 非洲之角国家索马里的总统说，土耳其正在建造一个从索马里发射火箭的设施，这将推动安卡拉的远程火箭测试计划。【原文：Turkey is building a facility to launch rockets from Somalia, the Horn of Africa nation’s president said, boosting Ankara’s long-range rocket testing program.】

item.title: 中国监管机构要求保险公司报告万科债务持有情况
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国银行业监管机构要求中国最大的保险公司报告其对中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China’s banking regulator told the country’s biggest insurers to report their financial exposure to China Vanke Co., in a bid to assess how much support the developer needs to avoid default, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯达尔支持的可再生能源开发商酝酿在阿布扎比上市
item.description: Infinity Power 是马斯达尔公司（Masdar）部分控股的一家可再生能源开发商，据其董事长称，该公司正考虑在未来两三年内在阿布扎比证券交易所出售其股票。【原文：Infinity Power, a renewable energy developer partly owned by Masdar, is considering selling its shares on the Abu Dhabi stock exchange within the next two or three years, according to its chairman.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易来到欧洲，给匈牙利廉价市场带来冲击
item.description: 可以说，在整个欧洲，没有哪个领导人比匈牙利的维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）与唐纳德-特朗普更亲近，或在意识形态上更一致。【原文：There is arguably no leader in all of Europe who’s more chummy, or ideologically aligned, with Donald Trump than Hungary’s Viktor Orban.】

item.title: 潘氏兄弟在获得债权人支持后避免破产
item.description: 印度尼西亚服装制造商 PT Pan Brothers 在获得债权人批准重组 8.6 万亿印尼盾（5.37 亿美元债务）后避免了破产。【原文：Indonesia’s apparel maker PT Pan Brothers avoided bankruptcy after it secured creditors’ approval to restructure 8.6 trillion rupiah ($537 million of debt).】

item.title: 中国反击债券狂潮，期债下挫
item.description: 中国央行数月来首次发出信号，表示对创纪录的主权债券涨势感到不安，这引发了现货债券和期货的下滑。【原文：China’s central bank sent its first signal in months of its discomfort with the record-setting sovereign bond rally, triggering a slide in cash bonds and futures.】

item.title: 马来西亚转向中国投资生物质能产业
item.description: 马来西亚一位部长表示，马来西亚政府正在寻求中国的投资，以发展其生物质能产业。【原文：Malaysia’s government is seeking investments from China to develop its biomass industry, according to a minister.】

item.title: 印度中央银行减少使用 NDFs 来对抗美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度央行已开始控制其不断膨胀的无本金交割远期合约，放弃了其抵御强势美元的主要工具之一。【原文：India’s central bank has started to rein in its ballooning non-deliverable forwards book, according to people familiar with the matter, shifting away from one of its key tools to push back against the strong dollar.】

item.title: 据说富士康已与日产接洽以获得控股权
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，被称为富士康的台湾 iPhone 和其他电子产品制造商鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., the Taiwan-based manufacturer of iPhones and other electric products known as Foxconn, has approached Nissan Motor Co. to take a controlling stake, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: M&A 投机刺激日本汽车制造商股票反弹
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）和日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.【原文：Japanese automaker shares climbed after news of a potential merger between Honda Motor Co. and Nissan Motor Co. stoked speculation that more deals are on the horizon for the industry.】

item.title: 中东原油市场趋紧，阿联酋、伊朗原油流量减少
item.description: 由于阿拉伯联合酋长国限制销售，来自伊朗的原油受制裁影响，中东地区的原油市场趋紧。【原文：Crude markets in the Middle East are tightening as the United Arab Emirates curbs sales and flows from Iran are hampered by sanctions.】

item.title: 聪明钱与笨钱— 你对特朗普有多狂热？
item.description:
专业人士正以比看上去更冷的眼光来看待当前的股市繁荣。【原文：

Professionals are approaching the current exuberance for stocks with a colder eye than it may seem.

item.title: 欧洲汽车股以 50%的折扣吸引低价猎手
item.description: 在经历了令人沮丧的一年之后，欧洲汽车制造商的股票终于找到了一些积极的动力，因为有迹象表明中国将采取更多的刺激措施，吸引投资者关注这一估值较低的行业。【原文：After a dismal year, shares of Europe’s automakers are finally finding some positive momentum as signs of additional Chinese stimulus draw investors to the sector’s lowly valuations.】

item.title: 研究显示，养老金谨慎令英国损失 250 亿英镑投资
item.description: 据资产管理公司 Columbia Threadneedle 称，随着储蓄者临近退休，对固定缴费养老金进行去风险化处理的做法将使英国在本届议会期间损失高达 250 亿英镑（320 亿美元）。【原文：The practice of de-risking defined contribution pension pots as savers close in on retirement will cost the UK as much as £25 billion ($32 billion) during the current Parliament, according to asset manager Columbia Threadneedle.】

item.title: 英国加速推进清洁能源有可能增加能源支出
item.description: 英国政府面临着为消费者带来更高的能源成本的风险，因为它正在努力实现一个具有挑战性的—升级—目标，即到 2030 年实现国家电力供应的去碳化。【原文：The UK government risks baking in higher energy costs for consumers as it pushes to meet a challenging — and upgraded — target to decarbonize the country’s power supply by 2030.】

item.title: 中国 AMEC 在起诉美国后被五角大楼除名
item.description: 美国国防部已将先进微细加工设备公司从中国军工企业名单中除名，该公司认为这是 "不合理的"。【原文：Advanced Micro-Fabrication Equipment Inc. has been removed from the US Department of Defense’s list of Chinese military companies, doing away with what the firm described as an “irrational” designation.】

item.title: 日产股票因可能与本田合并而大涨 24
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.）的股价周三飙升24%，创下至少五十年来的最大涨幅，原因是人们希望与本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）的潜在合作将挽救这家日本汽车制造商于金融危机之中。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s stock surged as much as 24% Wednesday, the most in at least five decades, on hopes that a potential tie-up with Honda Motor Co. will save the Japanese automaker from financial crisis.】

item.title: 特鲁多试图将副手离职说成是节日家庭矛盾
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理在其政党的年终庆典上笑容满面，试图淡化其领导层所面临的最严峻挑战。【原文：A defiant Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, all smiles at his political party’s end-of-year festivities, tried to downplay the most serious challenge yet facing his leadership.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索因降息押注而走低至历史最低点
item.description: 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 的心理里程碑，接近创下历史新低，因为对即将实行宽松政策的预期损害了菲律宾比索相对于本地区同类货币的吸引力。【原文：The Philippine peso dropped toward the psychological milestone of 59 per dollar, close to setting a fresh record low, as expectations for imminent easing hurt its appeal relative to regional peers.】
